about_the_game:
There are a lot of Action shooter Games out there that are really good and I played a lot of than. But in each of the games I was missing something. Either there is no destruction or there is no skill required and in some games there are just too many hackers. This is why my Brother and I made Battleforce. Battleforce contains all of it. It has destructible environments, there is skill required, we added a good anticheat against hacker and much more. Battleforce also include a Multyplayersystem and a Singelplayer system, so you can play with you freinds or alone. Battleforce has four diffrent game modes: Conquest, Capture the Flag, KillConfirmed and Team Deathmatch. In addition to that there are a couple of Missions you can Play. Battleforce also include abilities such as Air strik, radar scanner or energy protection shield. Of course, there is no shortage of weapons in Battleforce either. In Battleforce there are a lot of Weapons in six categories assigned: Assault rifle, SMG, Sniper, Shotgun, Pistol and Launchers. To the gameplay, you can say that every round is very varied and exciting. Either a bomb falls that destroys an entire bridge or entire houses get destroyed. Sometimes fighter jets fall from the sky. Watch out!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690K or AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 960, 4 GB or AMD Radeon R9 380, 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 or AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 10 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 2060 6 GB or AMD Radeon RX Vega 56, 8 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Battleforce is an action co-op shooter with a destructible environment. You can play with your friends or alone on a variety of different maps and modes.
